Package froggerLevels

Class Level

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
froggerLevels.World
froggerLevels.Level
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1, Level10, Level2, Level3, Level4, Level5, Level6, Level7, Level8, Level9
public abstract class Level
extends World
The base class for all game levels.
It is not a ready game level. It sets up a basic structure for the real game levels and allows functions like level display, checking if the game level has been completed or stopped, checking if the Animal at the game level has changed score or life etc.
Level will have no game objects other than an Animal and a background image for the level. It will also have the initial score and life ready.
Template Design Pattern is applied, where Level has abstract methods to be implemented differently by its subclasses, which are the real and concrete game levels.
